transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, bolo.
Customer: Good afternoon sir, main Humaira baat kar rahi hoon. Meri baat Mr. Milan ji se ho rahi hai Nexus export mein?
Customer: Haan, boliye.
Executive: Aapne customer care pe abhi ek ticket open kiya tha jisme aapke account manager se baat hui hogi. IndiaMART head office se bol rahi hoon sir. Aapne WhatsApp pe
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, aapne WhatsApp pe not satisfied mark kiya tha abhi aapke jo account manager hai unke liye. To mujhe ye jaanna tha sir ki aap kya problem face kar rahe hain?
Customer: Isme aisa hai ki wo mere ko kya hai catalog wagera apni profile banai thi na tab ki thodi product add ki thi. Meri website se utha ke to dusri product baki reh gayi thi to maine jis plan purchase kiya na unse baat ki wagera to unhone account manager ko sab bataya tha unko maine bataya tha do teen din se mere ko same cheez do do teen bar se ghuma ghuma ke bata rahe hain aur maine unko bola ki mere ko ye product add kar do wagera to mere se conversation mein acche se nahi ho raha hai mere ko samajh nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Product add karane hain aap ye keh rahe hain. Product add karana hai na sir aapko? Aur to koi dikkat nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi mam mere ko unse kaam karwane mein maza nahi aa raha hai wo meri baat theek se samajh nahi rahe hain aur dusra problem aa raha hai to mere ko koi apna yahan pe Gujarat ka wagera ka koi ho to account manager issue wo kijiye na.
Executive: Samajh sakti hoon. Kitne product count hai aap mujhe bataiye main help karungi aapki.
Customer: Help to mam wo to koi dikkat nahi hai par mere ko kya hai account manager change kar dijiye na hai to mere ko koi yahan se Gujarat wagera ka sarva dijiye na. Mere ko kya hai unse baat karne mein unke sath conversation mein rehne mein bhi maza aayega inke sath mere ko jam nahi raha hai khul mein.
Executive: Okay. Accha to dekhiye aap to yahi chahte hain na ki aapke jo products hain wo add ho jaye bas. Right?
Customer: Product add ho jaye haan aur inke sath dusre ko koi apne yahan ka ho na banda to unse baat karne mein mere ko aage koi problem issue wagera kuch hoga to unse baat karne mein mere ko maza aayega.
Executive: Okay. Aapki aawaz waise to thodi clear aa nahi rahi hai sir mujhe but phir bhi main try kar rahi hoon samajhne ki. Baki products kitne add aur karane hain aapko? Abhi aapke 20 product add 22 add hain isme.
Customer: Mera aur reh gaye 40 ya 50 product aur reh gaye.
Executive: Aur hain. Okay. To sir 40 ya 50 product hain aap apne end se kya koi problem aa rahi hai add karne mein? Ya aapko hamari help chahiye? Aapko to add haan.
Customer: Mam wo sab mere ko add karne mein dikkat wo aa rahi hai ki usme wo time consuming jyada hai aur mere ko kya hai main abhi jo running business kar raha hoon usme mere ko out of town hoon teen din se isliye main kuch kaam wagera kar nahi pa raha hoon aur usme ye mere ko aisa bata rahe hain ki aap apne behalf se kijiye koi dikkat aayegi main maine unko seedhe seedhe bola mere ko aap add kar dijiye main yahan pe aisa hoon is tarah se hoon mere ko abhi ho nahi pa raha hai aur isme aisa hai ki main ek mahina to hone aayega abhi thode din mein to mahina din se product add nahi hoga to koi inquiry generate nahi hogi na aise inquiry mere ko bata rahi thi to main unse do teen din se baat kar raha hoon main out of town hoon abhi Rajasthan hoon to main Gujarat jaunga mere ko kuch free time rahega to main kar paunga nahi aisa baat hui.
Executive: Okay. Sir main aapko apna WhatsApp number se aapko message kar rahi hoon. Aap apne product ki detail mujhe dijiye. Theek hai? Aapne jo PDF diya tha wo Ankur ne add kar diya hai aapke jo account manager hain. Aapne PDF bhi diya tha wo mujhe bata rahe the.
Customer: Wo PDF nahi add nahi mam PDF nahi add karna hai wo maine unko wo PDF diya tha ki usme jo jo product hai wo add karni hai to unhone PDF add kar diya add kar diya.
Executive: Accha ek second dijiye mujhe. Aapne product unko PDF diya mera catalog diya hai wo wo jo wo jo diya hai na unko catalog diya hai apna catalog rahega na wo diya hai to maine aisa bola ki aap ye product apne behalf se add kar dijiye apne hisab se main yahan pe hoon bahar hoon isliye to wo bol rahe the ki main aapko video meet mein sikha deta hoon aise wagera to wo to mere ko aata hi hai par main abhi nahi hoon busy hoon isliye maine unko bola to cooperate nahi kar rahe the to mere ko maza nahi aaya unse kaam karne mein.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Accha okay. Accha ek baat bataiye aap ye aapne jo PDF diya hai wo PDF maine khol rakha hai apne samne. Theek hai? Isme dehydrated white onion hai dehydrated red onion hai pink onion hai garlic hai isme se kafi sare product
Customer: White hydrated onion mein upar ke jo main product rahega na apne upar se jo main product rahega na wo sab add hai onion garlic wagera phir wo jo ginger wagera sab hai na usse koi niche ke sabhi baki hai product add hone aage.
Executive: Dehydrated vegetables and leaves baki hai? Aur aapka ginger baki hai. Dried fruit and vegetable aur dried onion.
Customer: Haan wo sab baki hai add hone mein.
Executive: Theek hai but isme sir price to hai nahi aur images bhi nahi hai to wo kaise dalenge?
Customer: Price main mere behalf se dal dunga aur usme dekho mam images mein kya dikkat aa rahi hai apne pehle bhi catalog design karwaya tha na to jo catalog mein images aate hain usi regarding mere pass images hai nahi to maine last time jab design karwaya tha na to unko bol diya tha to apne behalf se photos wagera add kar dijiye aur nahi hoga to meri website mein photos wagera hai meri jo website hai na nexus usme to maine usme se le lijiye wagera to wo mere ko ek ek photo le rahi hoon.
Executive: www.nexusexport.in
Customer: nexusexport.in ek second rukiye.
Executive: To mam wo main ek ek photo google se download karke aapko do to usme mera time consuming ho raha hai aisa bol raha tha unse par wo samajhne ko taiyar hi nahi thi to mere ko maza nahi aaya phir maine unse baat hi nahi ki kaat diya call.
Executive: Samajh sakti hoon. Main aapki chahti hoon jo problem hui hai. Main yahan pe out of town hoon main main yahan pe dusra kaam ke liye aaya hoon. Meri dusre kaam ke liye aaya hoon.
Customer: Nexus export karke ek minute ruk jaiye aapne home about product dried onion dried garlic dried vegetable and leaves okay carrot powders carrot cube cabbage matlab catalog mein hai na sabhi product wahan pe rakhe hue hain to aap apne hisab se maine unko aisa kiya kyuki wo ek ek product ka main photo download karu google se phir unko do to usme mera to main yahan pe IndiaMART mein apne hisab se add kar sakta hoon na par wo mere se abhi ho nahi pa raha hai to is regarding maine unko maine baat ki to wo bol rahe hain aap itna add kar dijiye hum specification mein dal dunga mere pass wo nahi hai abhi time consuming ho raha hai main yahan pe out of town mera dusra do teen kaam chal raha hai isliye main Rajasthan aaya hoon Gujarat se 400 kilometer ab main yahan pe mera kaam nipta unke liye photo download karke bheji aisa ho raha hai.
Executive: Okay maine aapka ye sare product total kare hain to isme se 38 product baith rahe hain. Theek hai? To ye matlab aapka sare product milakar dehydrated vegetable wala jo hai 24 25 25 hain aapke dehydrated vegetable leaves theek hai aapka spray dry fruit wale jo product hain wo nau hain and jo spices wale product hain wo aapke char hain jo ki add hone hain theek hai total aapke 38 product baith rahe hain isme se rate hai nahi rate aap ye keh rahe ho aur price wo aap khud dal loge jo cheeze dalni hogi yahan pe image per kg aur naam wo main dalwa deti hoon theek hai?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Baki ye abhi main thoda sa ek kaam kar rahi hoon kuch product main aaj add kara de rahi hoon aur kuch baki main char panch char panch product daily add karwa dungi to kuch dino mein ye add ho jayega chalega aapko koi dikkat to nahi hai?
Customer: Usme koi dikkat nahi hai main price theek hai main unko price dalne ko mana nahi kar raha price wo main apne hisab se bhi dal dunga par jo mere website mein aur wagera mein available hai wo to aap kar dijiye aisa bol raha tha to wo sunne ko taiyar nahi the.
Executive: Accha main samajh rahi hoon mafi chahti hoon aapko jo problem rahi hai uske liye baki main dheere dheere karke add ho payenge sir ek bar mein to matlab main try karti hoon agar ho jate hain warna main aapke abhi aaj se 10 product abhi add kara deti hoon baki teen char teen char product daily add kara diya karungi chalega aapko theek hai na sir?
Customer: Haan chalega par wo mere ko account manager change kar dijiye na inke sath mere ko kaam karne mein maza nahi aayega.
Executive: Accha samajh sakti hoon sir koi problem ho to direct aap mujhe call karna maine message kar diya aapko baki agar jyada problem lagegi to aage se action le lenge sir abhi filhal main aise kara mam abhi change karwa dijiye na kyuki mere ko aage jaake kaam rahega to mere ko koi conversation mein mera koi helpful rahega to mere ko maza aayega kaam karne mein abhi mera kya hai main single person abhi hoon to kaam karne mein kuch aisa issue aayega na to nahi maza aayega kaam karne mein to aap meri taraf se karwa dijiye na kuch.
Executive: Theek hai sir main ek baar dekh leti hoon team se baat kar leti hoon warna phir aap mujhe direct connect kar lena koi bhi complaint ho main unki senior manager hoon okay?
Customer: Okay mam.
Executive: Aap fikar mat kijiye sir aapki solutions ke liye koi aapka loss nahi hoga na koi problem hogi.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai baki main ye cheeze add kara ke aur phir yahan se ye aapka concern open ho gaya tha to kya usko close kar sakti hoon?
Customer: Haan kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai pehle main add kara deti hoon uske baad theek hai aur aapko bata dungi.
Executive: Thank you time dene ke liye sir have a good day.
Customer: Okay welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add more products to catalog.

- Dissatisfied with current account manager.

- Wants an account manager from Gujarat.

- Current account manager is not cooperative.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to help add products.

- Agreed to add a few products daily.

- Will look into changing the account manager.

- Provided her WhatsApp number for direct communication.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will add some products immediately.

- Will discuss account manager change with team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product addition, account manager, customer support, catalog
